ValidationRule.description: This validation rule stops an Opportunity from progressing past interview stage if interview notes are not input.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND($User.Bypass_Validation__c = False, $User.Username <> "formstack@vertoeducation.org", NOT(ISPICKVAL( LeadSource ,"Channel Enrollment")), OR( (ISBLANK( HS_Experience_Notes__c )), (ISBLANK( Student_Hobbies_or_Interests__c )), (ISBLANK( College_Planning_Process_Notes__c )), (ISBLANK( Thoughts_on_Major__c )), (ISBLANK( Student_Family_Support_Situation__c )) , (ISBLANK( What_drew_this_student_to_Verto__c )) , (ISBLANK( Does_student_have_concerns__c )) , (ISBLANK( Additional_feedback_for_Student_Success__c )) ), OR ( ISPICKVAL( StageName , "Stage - Application"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Application Approved (Accepted)"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Pending Enrollment"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Closed Won (Enrolled)")),
ISCHANGED( StageName ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please enter your student interview notes.
